Accept Paradise Corner Home Services Casino Contact Home Services Casino Contact Welcome to Paradise Corner Hotel! Our hotel offers a wide range of facilities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. You can enjoy our swimming pool, fitness center, and spa services. Additionally, we have a variety of dining options, including a restaurant that serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, as well as a café for lighter snacks and beverages. We kindly ask you to respect the hotel's quiet hours from 10 PM to 7 AM to ensure a pleasant environment for all guests. For any assistance or inquiries, our front desk is available 24/7. Accept Paradise Corner Home Services Casino Contact Home Services Casino Contact Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is Paradise Corner's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. 1. Information We Collect We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so — for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality 3. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. 4. Security of Your Information We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse. 5. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. 6. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us paradisecorner@gmail.com Sapphire Crest Hotel Home Services Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Accept Paradise Corner Home Services Casino Contact Home Services Casino Contact Our Exceptional Services At Paradise Corner, we are dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of services that cater to the diverse needs of our clients. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction is at the core of everything we do. Whether you are looking for innovative solutions, reliable support, or expert advice, our team of professionals is here to help you achieve your goals. We understand that each client is unique, which is why we offer tailored services designed to meet your specific requirements. From the initial consultation to the final implementation, we work closely with you to ensure that every aspect of our service aligns with your vision and objectives. Our holistic approach combines industry-leading expertise, cutting-edge technology, and unparalleled dedication to deliver results that exceed expectations. Explore our extensive service offerings and discover how we can help you drive success and growth. At Paradise Corner, we are more than just a service provider; we are your trusted partner in achieving excellence. 302+ Room & Suites 25 Restaurant 510+ Exceptional Food 65 Destination Exclusive Services Hotel Accommodation Enjoy our luxurious hotel accommodation with spacious rooms and breathtaking views of the city skyline. Each room is elegantly furnished and equipped with modern amenities to ensure your comfort throughout your stay. Restaurant and Bar Indulge in a culinary journey at our world-class restaurant offering a diverse menu of local and international dishes. Whether you are looking for a hearty breakfast, a leisurely lunch, or a gourmet dinner, our chefs are ready to delight your taste buds. Spa and Wellness Center Relax and rejuvenate at our exclusive spa and wellness center. Choose from a range of therapeutic treatments including massages, facials, and body scrubs, all designed to enhance your well-being. Conference Rooms and Events Host your events and conferences in our state-of-the-art facilities equipped with modern technology and flexible spaces. Whether it's a corporate meeting, a grand celebration, or a special event, our dedicated event planning team will ensure everything runs smoothly. Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is until 12:00 PM. If you require early check-in or late check-out, please contact our front desk for availability. Do you offer airport transportation? Yes, we offer airport transportation services. Please contact us in advance to arrange your pick-up and drop-off times. Is parking available at the hotel? Yes, we have complimentary parking available for all our guests. There is also a valet service for added convenience. Are pets allowed in the hotel? Yes, we are a pet-friendly hotel. Please inform us in advance if you will be bringing a pet. Additional charges may apply. Sapphire Crest Hotel Home Services Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer
